sentences: Ma arvan, et see on minust väga tore.
Ta küsis minult, kas ma olen temast vanem.
context: The word 'minust' is a case form of the personal pronoun 'mina' (I) in Estonian. It generally translates to 'from me', 'of me', or 'about me' depending on the context, and indicates possession, origin, or reference to the speaker.
